# Using HEVC video with alpha

**Sample Code**

Play, write, and export HEVC video with an alpha channel to add overlay effects to your video processing.

## Overview



## Presentation

- **Monitoring playback progress in your app**: Observe the playback of a media asset to update your app’s user-interface state.
- **AVPlayerLayer**: An object that presents the visual contents of a player object.
- **AVSynchronizedLayer**: A Core Animation layer that derives its timing from a player item so that you can synchronize layer animations with media playback.
